install.name: Spearhead Facebook Like Button.
install.author: Thomas George
install.description: Facebook like button by spearhead softwares.

param.name: auto_discovery
param.label: Url Auto Discovery
param.description: The module will automatically find url's to like for each pages.

param.name: like_url
param.label: Url To Like(not needed when using url auto discovery mode or FBML mode)
param.description: Full Url eg:http://www.spearheadsoftwares.com/contactus.php. This makes the module to work only for one url and is not recommended. Use Url Auto Discovery whenever possible.

param.name: layout_style
param.label: Layout Style
param.description: Determines the size and amount of social context next to the button.

param.name: show_faces
param.label: Show Faces
param.description: Show profile picture below the button.

param.name: width
param.label: Module Width
param.description: The width of facebook like plugin in pixels

param.name: verb_to_display
param.label: Verb to display
param.description: The verb to display in the button. Currently only 'like' and 'recommend' are supported.

param.name: color_scheme
param.label: Color Scheme
param.description: The color scheme of the plugin.
